articles.content: Samsung today began a new winter deals event, offering sales on TVs, tablets, monitors, memory, audio accessories, and more. The "Discover Samsung" event is set to run through December 15 and introdu… [+1371 chars]

articles.title: Nintendo Nukes Documentary On Canceled Zelda Tactics Game From YouTube - Kotaku

articles.content: In October, gaming history YouTube channel DidYouKnowGaming reported on a failed 2004 pitch for a Zelda tactics game on the Nintendo DS called Heroes of Hyrule. Two months later, the Mario maker has … [+3702 chars]
